thread.section_title: Citadines South Kensington - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: GREAT FIND
thread.title_full: GREAT FIND - Review of Citadines South Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Cathy2707
title: GREAT FIND
text: Booked this place last minute to attend conference in area. Great find in nice location - close to tube and a short pleasant walk to High St Kensington. Booked a 1 bed apartment which was more than enough space for 2 people. Reception staff very friendly and most helpful. First time staying but will be back.
